mapper.select:
SELECT a.id, a.name_ch nameCh, a.name_en nameEn, b.user_name createName, CONVERT(a.create_time, char) createTime, c.user_name lastUpdateName, CONVERT(a.last_update_time, char) lastUpdateTime FROM report_page a LEFT JOIN sys_eve_user_staff b ON a.create_id = b.user_id LEFT JOIN sys_eve_user_staff c ON a.last_update_id = c.user_id WHERE 1 = 1
AND (a.name_ch LIKE '%${name}%' OR a.name_en LIKE '%${name}%')
ORDER BY a.create_time DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO report_page (id, name_ch, name_en, create_id, create_time, last_update_id, last_update_time) VALUES (#{id}, #{nameCh}, #{nameEn}, #{createId}, #{createTime}, #{createId}, #{createTime})
mapper.select: SELECT a.id, a.name_ch nameCh, a.name_en nameEn, b.user_name createName, CONVERT(a.create_time, char) createTime, c.user_name lastUpdateName, CONVERT(a.last_update_time, char) lastUpdateTime FROM report_page a LEFT JOIN sys_eve_user_staff b ON a.create_id = b.user_id LEFT JOIN sys_eve_user_staff c ON a.last_update_id = c.user_id WHERE a.id = #{id}
mapper.update: UPDATE report_page SET name_ch = #{nameCh}, name_en = #{nameEn}, last_update_id = #{lastUpdateId}, last_update_time = #{lastUpdateTime} WHERE id = #{id}
